hero.title:
Move from Reactive Defense to Proactive Resolution
Never Miss a Notice, Deadline, or Obligation
hero.subtitle: Managing litigations, regulatory filings, and compliance obligations manually is error-prone and risky. Our Litigation & Compliance Intelligence platform automates notice tracking, compliance checklists, and regulatory monitoring, so your business always stays protected, audit-ready, and ahead of deadlines.

features.title: Key Capabilities
features.subtitle: Automate your entire legal workflow—from risk identification to courtroom-ready documentation.

items.title: Auto Notice Tracking
items.description: Automatically fetch notices from portals like Income Tax, TRACES, GST, etc., and centralize them in one place. Summarizes each notice, highlights action items, and clearly defines allegations or claims made by authorities — enabling timely and informed responses.

items.title: Compliance Checklist Automation
items.description: Digitize statutory, tax, and regulatory compliance monitoring with reminders. Enable 'Maker' to mark compliances and 'Checker' to review them. Provide leadership with a 360-degree view of the entire compliance matrix for better oversight and governance.

items.title: Case & Litigation Management
items.description: Centralize all legal cases with structured tracking of timelines, hearing dates, and document repositories. Assign responsibilities, track case history, receive automated alerts for upcoming hearings, and monitor progress end-to-end — ensuring accountability and timely action.

items.title: Regulatory Monitoring
items.description: Continuously monitor changes in laws, rules, and circulars issued by key regulators such as MCA, RBI, SEBI, GST, and Income Tax. Get contextual alerts with summaries, impact analysis, and relevance mapping to your business — ensuring proactive compliance and zero oversight.

items.title: Audit & Disclosure Readiness
items.description: Maintain a centralized repository of compliance logs, statutory filings, and supporting documents with clear audit trails. Ensure readiness for internal audits, regulatory inspections, and board disclosures — reducing last-minute scrambling and enhancing transparency.

items.title: Centralized Repository
items.description: Store and manage compliance documents, notices, orders, and filings securely with robust encryption. Leverage advanced search capabilities and role-based access controls to ensure quick retrieval, confidentiality, and regulatory compliance at all times.

detailSection.title: Your litigations are solved even before they appear :)
detailSection.description:
Litigation & Compliance Intelligence ensures you stay ahead of deadlines and risks:
  • Upload or sync notices, compliance requirements, and case data into a centralized system.
  • AI agents classify, track, and flag pending obligations, hearings, and regulatory updates.
  • Dashboards, reminders, and audit logs give management a single view of risks, deadlines, and compliance status.

cta.title: Stay Compliant. Stay Protected. Stay Ahead.
cta.subtitle: With Litigation & Compliance Intelligence, your organization never misses a statutory filing, litigation notice, or compliance deadline. Transform compliance from a burden into a strategic safeguard.
